text: Sky blue is a shade of cyan. ==Shades of sky blue== ===Vivid sky blue=== A vivid shade of sky blue ===Celeste=== A lighter shade of cyan colour name C M Y K R G B HEX celeste (sky blue, heavenly blue) 030 000 000 000 178 255 255 B2FFFF celeste polvere (powdery) 010 000 000 000 230 255 255 E6FFFF celeste pallido (pale) 016 000 003 000 204 255 255 CCFFFF celeste velato (veiled / overcast) 020 010 010 000 204 230 230 CCE6E6 celeste opaco (opaque) 050 020 020 000 128 204 204 80CCCC ===Deep sky blue=== A deep shade of sky blue ==Color codes== ===Sky blue=== *In hex:#87CEEB ===Vivid skyblue=== *In hex:#00CCFF ===Celeste=== *In hex:#B2FFFF ===Deep skyBlue=== *In hex:#00BFFF ==Related pages== *Blue *Cyan
title: Sky blue
